ActivityMetadata.Name: PD List log entries
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD List log entries
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List all of the incident log entries across the entire account.
A log of all the events that happen to an Incident, and these are exposed as Log Entries.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#log-entries)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

List log entries

List all of the incident log entries across the entire account. A log of all the events that happen to an Incident, and these are exposed as Log Entries. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#log-entries)

Method: Get

OperationID: listLogEntries

EndPoint:

/log_entries
